article_title: British Bosses Get Scottish Independence Jitters as Polls Narrow
article_text:
LONDON—As polls narrow ahead of a referendum on Scottish independence, business leaders once confident Scotland would remain part of the U.K. are starting to get jittery.

"Two weeks away from the Scottish referendum, let's hope we're not actually going full-circle, that common sense prevails and that we're going to continue to draw strength from our long-standing union," said Michael Rake, chairman of telecom giant BT...
